## setValue() function

Sets value to objects property using string expression

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function setValue(object: any, value: any, expression: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  object | <code>any</code> | Object which property value will be set |
|  value | <code>any</code> | Value that will be set |
|  expression | <code>string</code> | Expression for setting value |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
